code: export var required=function required(value){if(value)return undefined;return'Field is required';};export var maxLengthCreator=function maxLengthCreator(maxLength){return function(value){if(value.length>maxLength)return"Max length is ".concat(maxLength," symbols");return undefined;};};export var voidValue=function voidValue(value){return value&&value.trim()===''?"Enter your text":undefined;};
